General.Name: Shanghai Sheng Jian Environment Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Sheng Jian Environment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, system integration, and operation and maintenance management of exhaust gas treatment systems and other equipment for semiconductor industry in the People's Republic of China. The company offers pan-semiconductor process waste gas solution, which includes Pre-exhaust gas treatment device, general exhaust system, acid and alkali waste gas system, toxic exhaust system, and VOCs treatment system; chemical supply and recovery system solutions comprising chemical supply system CDS and organic solvent recovery system SRS; Flue gas purification solution, such as desulfurization and denitrification system,; and industrial VOCs solutions includes zeolite rotary concentration, fixed bed concentration, thermal oxidation, and condensation treatment systems. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Taihu Shijia International Building, Shanghai, China
